entry.text:
Hi! BizUply is an all-in-one business management system combining CRM, calendar, communication, and business collaborations — all in one place.

How can I help you today?

how_it_helps.text:
BizUply helps business owners replace scattered tools with one clear system.

Manage clients, time, communication, and collaborations from a single dashboard.

time_calendar.text:
In BizUply, the calendar is part of the CRM.

It’s used to manage work time, tasks, internal meetings, collaborations, and follow-ups — not just client appointments.

calendar_examples.text:
Business owners use the CRM calendar to:
• Plan daily work
• Track client activity
• Schedule internal meetings
• Manage collaborations
• Avoid missed tasks

collaborations.text:
BizUply includes a built-in business collaboration network.

Connect with complementary businesses, manage referrals, and create structured partnerships that generate real revenue.

collaborations_for.text: Business collaborations are ideal for service providers, freelancers, consultants, and local businesses that want to grow through partnerships — not ads.

features.text:
BizUply includes everything your business needs:

• Professional business page
• Full CRM for clients
• Smart calendar inside the CRM
• Messaging & chat
• Ratings & reviews
• Business collaborations
• Insights & analytics

All included in one plan.

calendar_crm.text:
The calendar in BizUply is not a separate tool.

It’s fully integrated into the CRM and used to manage time, tasks, meetings, collaborations, and client follow-ups — all in one place.

pricing.text:
BizUply offers one professional plan for all businesses.

Same features. Same tools. Fair pricing.

You can choose how to pay:
• Monthly subscription
• Yearly subscription (discounted)

payment_details.text:
Free Trial:
• 14 days
• No credit card required

Monthly Plan:
• Can be canceled anytime
• Cancellation must be done before the next billing date

Yearly Plan:
• Discounted annual subscription
• Runs for a full year
• Cannot be canceled or shortened

demo.text:
The demo lets you explore the dashboard, CRM, calendar, and messaging system.

The demo is view-only and does not include real data.
